script.name: Lib.Gen.Anarkis.ACC.Get.DockedShips
script.description: ACC - Lib : Get dock/owned ACC ships

line.text: '%s%s was removed from array because it does not belong to player.'
'%s%s was removed from array because of skipme variable.'
'%s%s was removed from array because owner %s is not equal to ship ownwer %s.'
'%s%s was removed from array because it is no acc ship.'
'%s%s was removed from array because it does not have the required ship class %s'
'%s%s was removed from array because it has %s set as homebase instead of %s'

line.comment: * - Else, check if they are not waiting to go

line.text: '%s%s was removed from array because its task 0 is in use.'
'%s%s was removed from array because its hull is damaged: %s%.'

line.comment: * Check for ships already assigned to a wing

line.text: '%s%s was removed from array because it already belongs to a flight wing.'
'%s%s was removed from array because it is a freighter.'

line.comment: * No bombers wanted, but ship IS a bomber

line.text: '%s%s was removed from array because it is a bomber.'

line.comment: * Bombers wanted, but ship is NOT a bomber

line.text: '%s%s was removed from array because it is NOT a bomber.'

%s%s was removed from array because it is a freighter.
